text:
Hi All,

We're about to list our app that integrates free and open source accounting platform with HubSpot

I want to create a post about it in forum, but couldn't decide which category is the best like that announcement. Any ideas?

Thanks in advance

The <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Share-Your-Work/bd-p/designers_bestpractice|“Share Your Work”> board in the community is probably the best place. Also, we have a newly created (as in literally just made) <#C0121KGC6RM|showcase> channel! Feel free to post it in there as well!
